intro: Delissea procera, commonly known as the tall delissea, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its erect, branching stems and opposite leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soils and requires full sun to partial shade for optimal growth. Delissea procera is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
